text: Anata gata wa, arrā o sashioite gūzō o hai shi, kyogi o netsuzō shite iru nisuginai. Anata gataga arrā o sashioite haisuru mono-tachi wa, anata gata ni onmegumi o ataeru chikara wanai. Dakara, arrā kara kate o motome, kare ni tsukae, kansha shi nasai. Anata gata wa kare no omoto ni kisa reru nodearu
